alert.note: Alert for Mercer (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 5:05AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream and river flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Along the Bluestone River. This includes portions of southwest Virginia and southeast West Virginia, including the following counties, in southwest Virginia, Tazewell. In southeast West Virginia, Mercer. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 505 AM EDT, gauge reports indicate that heavy rain and runoff are resulting in flooding along and near the Bluestone River. - Flood stage for the Bluestone River is 7 feet, and the gauge is currently reporting 7.2 feet. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pinnacle Rock State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
